questions: Can you tell me about a time when you faced a challenging situation at work and how you dealt with it?
Describe a situation where you had to work with a difficult team member. How did you handle it?
Give me an example of a goal you set and how you achieved it.
Tell me about a time when you had to learn something new quickly. How did you manage it?
Describe a time when you made a mistake at work. How did you handle it and what did you learn?
